snippet: Sanford A. Rubenstein, known for reaching multimillion-dollar settlements in police brutality cases, has been out of sight after being accused of sexual assault last week.
abstract: Prominent New York City lawyer Sanford A Rubenstein, known for reaching multimillion-dollar settlements in police brutality cases, remains uncharacteristically out of sight after being accused of sexual assault; his law firm, Rubenstein & Rynecki, declines to comment, referring calls to Benjamin Brafman, a well-known criminal defense lawyer who has been retained by Rubenstein.
lead_paragraph: Sanford A. Rubenstein, known for reaching multimillion-dollar settlements in police brutality cases, has been out of sight after being accused of sexual assault last week.

headline.main: Accused of Rape, a Previously High-Decibel Lawyer Goes Silent
headline.print_headline: As Rape Charges Are Examined, a Once High-Decibel Lawyer Falls Silent
